entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 70%
